Description.Text: Facilities Guests can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 135 rooms. The upper floors of the hotel can be accessed by lift. A conference room is among the facilities. Wireless internet access (no extra charge) is available to travellers. Rooms A range of amenities complete the standard fittings of the accommodation units. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation features an outdoor pool. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
